column4: Q: Is there a GUI tool to edit/create custom Launchers for Unity?   alacarte is ~20Megs of extra packages and I am not sure it will do what i want..
/usr/share/applications and .desktop files are all just freedesktop.org stuff, right?
yes freedesktop houses the standards (such as they are)
does Ubuntu package a GUI tool to create launchers for it, though?
the main one is alacarte. i dont know of any others
it was my impression that unity still uses the launchers
